Santa Trainee:
Merry Chritmas, my little Adventurer! To make your small Christmas tree, you will need:
* Star Ornaments (4) * Bead Ornaments (4) * Fir Tree Branches (10) * Flower Pot (1) Give me 10 small Christmas trees and I will give you a special Christmas tree, which has a magical effect of increasing health and magic regeneration while under its branches. Special Christmas trees can be summoned anywhere in-game, but you will not receive the magical effects of the tree if it is summoned anywhere inside peace zones.
"I want a small Christmas Tree" "Exchange 10 small trees for big Christmas Tree" "Exchange 10 trees for 1 Santa's Hat!" "Exchange 10 trees for 1 Santa's Antlers!" "Exchange 20 trees for 1 Agathion Seal Bracelet - Rudolph!"
